item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! My name is Yangyang Li, and I’m a Ph.D. student in the DGP Program at Northwestern University Feinberg School of Medicine. I’m passionate about developing algorithm and using programming languages like C++, Rust, and Python to solve complex problems in the field of Computational Biology. As a Ph.D. student, I have the opportunity to work on exciting research projects that push the boundaries of what we know and have the potential to make a real impact in the world.
